getBlockHash(uint256).notice: Returns the Bitcoin block hash at a specific height.

getLatestBlockHeight().notice: Returns the height of the last submitted canonical Bitcoin chain.

getLatestBlockTime().notice: Returns the timestamp of the last submitted canonical Bitcoin chain.

submit(uint256,bytes).notice: Submits a new Bitcoin chain segment. Must be heavier (not necessarily longer) than the chain rooted at getBlockHash(getLatestBlockHeight()f).

documentation.text: Emitted whenever the contract accepts a new heaviest chain.

Emitted only right after a difficulty retarget, when the contract
 accepts a new heaviest chain with updated difficulty.
Emitted when we reorg out a portion of the chain.
Returns the Bitcoin block hash at a specific height.
Returns the height of the last submitted canonical Bitcoin chain.
Returns the timestamp of the last submitted canonical Bitcoin chain.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "must submit at least one block"

arguments.value: must submit at least one block

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "must submit at least one block"

documentation.text:
Submits a new Bitcoin chain segment. Must be heavier (not necessarily
 longer) than the chain rooted at getBlockHash(getLatestBlockHeight()f).
